languages.text: {n}Гвардеец усмехается.{/n} "Не пытайся дурачить меня. Мы оба знаем истину. Расколотое Небо — это бездна, поглотившая все снаружи, первозданная тьма. Иногда Небо присылает людей, но это фальшивки, тени в людской коже. Они сами не знают, что их не существует, но я — я вижу их насквозь. Они приходят со стальной звезды, надзирающей с небес алым оком. С престола ваших правителей".

{n}The Guardsman chuckles.{/n} "Don't try to fool me. We both know the truth: the Riven Sky is the abyss that has devoured everything outside — the primordial darkness. Sometimes, the Sky sends people, but they're imitations — shadows wearing human skins. They don't know that they don't exist, but I... I see right through them. They come from the steel star with the scarlet overseeing eye: from your rulers' throne."
languages.original_text: {n}Гвардеец усмехается.{/n} "Не пытайся дурачить меня. Мы оба знаем истину. Расколотое Небо — это бездна, поглотившая все снаружи, первозданная тьма. Иногда Небо присылает людей, но это фальшивки, тени в людской коже. Они сами не знают, что их не существует, но я — я вижу их насквозь. Они приходят со стальной звезды, надзирающей с небес алым оком. С престола ваших правителей".

They come from the steel star with the scarlet overseeing eye. From your rulers' throne."

languages.text: {n}El Guardia se ríe.{/n} «No intente engañarme. Ambos sabemos la verdad: el Cielo Desgarrado es el abismo que lo ha devorado todo ahí fuera: la oscuridad primordial. A veces, el Cielo envía gente, pero son imitaciones; sombras con piel humana. No saben que no existen, pero yo... veo a través de ellos. Vienen de la estrella de acero con el ojo escarlata que todo lo ve: del trono de sus gobernantes».
languages.original_text: {n}The Guardsman chuckles.{/n} "Don't try to fool me. We both know the truth: the Riven Sky is the abyss that has devoured everything outside — the primordial darkness. Sometimes, the Sky sends people, but they're imitations — shadows wearing human skins. They don't know that they don't exist, but I... I see right through them. They come from the steel star with the scarlet overseeing eye: from your rulers' throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Guardia se ríe.{/n} «No intente engañarme. Ambos sabemos la verdad: el Cielo Desgarrado es el abismo que lo ha devorado todo ahí fuera: la oscuridad primordial. A veces, el Cielo envía gente, pero son imitaciones; sombras con piel humana. No saben que no existen, pero yo... veo a través de ellos. Vienen de la estrella de acero con el ojo escarlata que todo lo ve: del trono de sus gobernantes».

languages.text: {n}眼前的帝国卫队士兵笑了起来。{/n}“别以为你能骗过我。我们都很清楚，破碎之空是原始的黑暗，是吞噬了万物的深渊。有时候，破碎之空会派它的使者过来，但那些人都是冒牌货，是披着人皮的阴影。他们不过是虚幻之物，虽然他们意识不到，但我……我能看穿他们的伪装。他们来自长着猩红巨眼的钢铁之星，来自你主人的王座。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Guardsman chuckles.{/n} "Don't try to fool me. We both know the truth: the Riven Sky is the abyss that has devoured everything outside — the primordial darkness. Sometimes, the Sky sends people, but they're imitations — shadows wearing human skins. They don't know that they don't exist, but I... I see right through them. They come from the steel star with the scarlet overseeing eye: from your rulers' throne."

languages.text: {n}ガーズマンはクスクス笑う。{/n}「俺を騙そうとするな。お互いに真実を知っているじゃないか。割れた空は外部のすべてをむさぼり食っている深淵のことだ―根源的な闇だ。たまに、空は人を送っていくるが、それは模造品―人の皮を着た影だ。彼らは自分が存在しないということを知らないが、俺は…彼らを通じて分かる。彼らは緋色の監視する目を持っていて鋼の惑星から来た。あんたたちの支配者の玉座から」
languages.original_text: {n}The Guardsman chuckles.{/n} "Don't try to fool me. We both know the truth: the Riven Sky is the abyss that has devoured everything outside — the primordial darkness. Sometimes, the Sky sends people, but they're imitations — shadows wearing human skins. They don't know that they don't exist, but I... I see right through them. They come from the steel star with the scarlet overseeing eye: from your rulers' throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}ガーズマンはクスクス笑う。{/n}「俺を騙そうとするな。お互いに真実を知っているじゃないか。割れた空は外部のすべてをむさぼり食っている深淵のことだ―根源的な闇だ。たまに、空は人を送っていくるが、それは模造品―人の皮を着た影だ。彼らは自分が存在しないということを知らないが、俺は…彼らを通じて分かる。彼らは緋色の監視する目を持っていて鋼の惑星から来た。あんたたちの支配者の玉座から」

languages.text: {n}Le garde pousse un ricanement.{/n} « Inutile de faire l'{mf|innocent|innocente}. Nous connaissons tous les deux la vérité : la Fracture Céleste est l'abysse qui a tout dévoré sur son passage, les ténèbres primordiales. Parfois, elle nous envoie des hommes, mais ce ne sont que des imitations... des ombres revêtues de peaux humaines. Elles n'ont pas conscience de leur nature factice, mais pour ma part... je sais parfaitement à quoi m'en tenir. Elles viennent de l'étoile d'acier à l'œil écarlate auquel rien n'échappe, le trône de vos seigneurs et maîtres. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Guardsman chuckles.{/n} "Don't try to fool me. We both know the truth: the Riven Sky is the abyss that has devoured everything outside — the primordial darkness. Sometimes, the Sky sends people, but they're imitations — shadows wearing human skins. They don't know that they don't exist, but I... I see right through them. They come from the steel star with the scarlet overseeing eye: from your rulers' throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le garde pousse un ricanement.{/n} « Inutile de faire l'{mf|innocent|innocente}. Nous connaissons tous les deux la vérité : la Fracture Céleste est l'abysse qui a tout dévoré sur son passage, les ténèbres primordiales. Elles viennent de l'étoile d'acier à l'œil écarlate auquel rien n'échappe, le trône de vos seigneurs et maîtres. »

languages.text: {n}Muhafız kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Beni kandırmaya çalışma. İkimiz de gerçeği biliyoruz. Çatlak Gök; dışarıdaki her şeyi yutmuş olan dipsizliktir, kadim karanlıktır. Bazen insan gönderir ama onlar taklittir, insan postu giymiş gölgelerdir. Var olmadıklarını bilmezler. Bense onların içini görürüm. Kızıl renkli gözeten gözlü çelik yıldızdan, hükümdarlarınızın tahtından gelirler."
languages.original_text: {n}The Guardsman chuckles.{/n} "Don't try to fool me. We both know the truth: the Riven Sky is the abyss that has devoured everything outside — the primordial darkness. Sometimes, the Sky sends people, but they're imitations — shadows wearing human skins. They don't know that they don't exist, but I... I see right through them. They come from the steel star with the scarlet overseeing eye: from your rulers' throne."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muhafız kıkırdıyor.{/n} "Beni kandırmaya çalışma. İkimiz de gerçeği biliyoruz. Çatlak Gök; dışarıdaki her şeyi yutmuş olan dipsizliktir, kadim karanlıktır. Bazen insan gönderir ama onlar taklittir, insan postu giymiş gölgelerdir. Var olmadıklarını bilmezler. Bense onların içini görürüm. Kızıl renkli gözeten gözlü çelik yıldızdan, hükümdarlarınızın tahtından gelirler."

languages.text: {n}Der Gardist lacht.{/n} "Haltet mich nicht zum Narren. Wir kennen beide die Wahrheit. Der Gespaltene Himmel ist der Abgrund, der alles verschlingt ... die Urdunkelheit. Ab und an schickt der Himmel jemanden ... Imitationen ... Schatten mit menschlichem Antlitz. Sie wissen nicht, dass sie nicht existieren, aber ich ... Ich sehe durch sie hindurch. Sie kommen von dem stählernen Stern mit dem purpurnen Auge ... vom Thron Eurer Herrscher."
languages.original_text: {n}The Guardsman chuckles.{/n} "Don't try to fool me. We both know the truth: the Riven Sky is the abyss that has devoured everything outside — the primordial darkness. Sometimes, the Sky sends people, but they're imitations — shadows wearing human skins. They don't know that they don't exist, but I... I see right through them. They come from the steel star with the scarlet overseeing eye: from your rulers' throne."

Ab und an schickt der Himmel jemanden ... Imitationen ... Schatten mit menschlichem Antlitz. Sie wissen nicht, dass sie nicht existieren, aber ich ... Ich sehe durch sie hindurch.
